name: Vibe Bar
description:
Despite being one of my smaller projects. I made this entire game as a game for relaxation. If you're ever stressed and just want to relax. Then this is 100% for you.

What is in it? Easy, inside Vibe Bar, is some relaxing and easy enemies to fight. Which are completely optional. The soundtrack contains some classic favorites. And best of all, there is plenty of NPCs to talk to.
